I would compost all organic waste to create nutrient-rich soil for my garden.
I would use reusable bags, containers, and utensils to reduce the amount of waste generated.
I would donate or sell items that are no longer needed to reduce waste in landfills.
I would recycle and compost all waste to reduce the amount of waste that goes to landfills.
I would switch to a zero- lifestyle by reducing my consumption of single-use items and relying on natural methods of waste management.
